sentences.en: A porcelain - fused -- metal material was prepared using the domestic high - purity feldspar powders.
sentences.cn: 用高纯长石粉等国产原料,采用熔融后 水淬 、湿法球磨的工艺,制备齿科用金属烤瓷材料.

sentences.en: Ceramic body for fan wei feldspar, quartz, gaol in, etc.
sentences.cn: 陶瓷坯体用原料主要有长石 、 石英 、 高岭土等.

sentences.en: Early Yanshanian intrusions are mainly adamellite, biotite K feldspar granite with small amount of granodiorite.
sentences.cn: 燕山早期侵入岩以二长花岗岩 、 黑云钾长花岗岩为主,其次为花岗闪长岩.

sentences.en: Feldspar commonly used are: granite a long stone set fire to rocks.
sentences.cn: 常用的长石主要有: 花岗岩、霞硌、正长石等火烧岩.

sentences.en: Industry: petroleum, diamonds, iron ore, phosphates, feldspar, bauxite, uranium, gold.
sentences.cn: 工业: 原油, 钻石, 铁矿, 磷酸盐, 长石矿, 铝氧石, 铀, 黄金.

sentences.en: It's got lower aluminium and more magnesium relative to silicon, so it has a lower abundance of feldspar [minerals], and so it has clearly undergone a unique geological history.
sentences.cn: 和硅比起来，它的表面含吕较少。 含镁较多。 所以它表面的长石（一种矿物质）含量很少，水星有一个独特的地理历史。

sentences.en: Jadeite jade consists of minerals of pyroxene, amphibole and feldspar groups.
sentences.cn: 翡翠由辉石族 、 角闪石族、长石族矿物组成.

sentences.en: Many common minerals, such as feldspar, develop microscopic pits during weathering.
sentences.cn: 许多常见矿物(例如长石)会在风化过程中发展出微小坑洞.

sentences.en: Namely temperature of potash feldspar decomposition and calcium are favorable forming feldspar.
sentences.cn: 即温度升高对钾长石分解及钙长石形成均有利.

sentences.en: Potassium - feldspar is a main resource of potash fertilizer.
sentences.cn: 钾长石分解制钾肥是钾肥制造的一条重要途径.

sentences.en: The deposit is an alkali - feldspar granite type Ta deposit.
sentences.cn: 该矿床为碱性长石花岗岩型钽矿床.

sentences.en: The development of ceramics industry of Anhui promotes the utilization of potassium feldspar resources.
sentences.cn: 安徽陶瓷工业的发展,提供了开发钾长石资源的市场.

sentences.en: The feldspar found in granite gives the Brandberg Massif areddish appearance during sunset.
sentences.cn: 在花冈岩中发现的长石使布兰德山在日落时分呈现红色外貌。

sentences.en: The nodule minerals consist of quartz, plagioclase, amphibole, K ? feldspar , goethite, lepidocrocite, δ MnO ? 2 , illite, and muscovite etc.
sentences.cn: 结核的组成矿物有δ MnO2 、 针铁矿 、 水针铁矿、石英 、 斜长石 、 角闪石 、 钾长石 、 伊利石和白云母等.

sentences.en: The ore - hunting indicator is of calcite - potassium feldspar veins containing pyritohedron pyrite.
sentences.cn: 直接找矿标志为含五角十二面体黄铁矿铁方解石钾长石脉.

sentences.en: The results indicate that the jade mainly consists of illite and a small quantity of feldspar, quartz, hematite, siderite and rutile, which is argillaceous sedimentary rock.
sentences.cn: 结果表明，其矿物成分以伊利石为主，含有少量的长石、石英、赤铁矿、菱铁矿和金红石，为泥质沉积岩。

sentences.en: The sherdscontain quartz, feldspar , calcspar and sericite as well as some charcoal.
sentences.cn: 陶片中含有石英、长石 、 方解石、绢云母等各种矿物颗粒,还含有一定量的炭.

sentences.en: This sandstone consists of quartz primarily and feldspar secondly.
sentences.cn: 这种砂岩的成份以石英为主,长石次之.

trans.tran_en: a type of grey or white mineral
